TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 針對工作流程執行個體的 維護於 SQL 資料庫中之追蹤資料，提供存取權。

span.span: Provides access to tracking data maintained in a SQL database by the for a workflow instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 呼叫 和 會傳回 物件，這些物件可讓使用者存取由特定工作流程執行個體的 在 SQL 資料庫中維護的追蹤資料。 objects are returned by a call to both and and provide access to the tracking data maintained in a SQL database by the for a specific workflow instance. 類別會針對其維護集合的屬性，對資料庫的存取進行最佳化。The class optimizes its access to the database for its properties, which maintain collections. [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] 。 . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得所顯示之工作流程清單中所包含的全部 物件相關資訊。The following code example shows how to obtain information about all objects contained in a list of displayed workflows. 此程式碼會針對出現在 `ListViewItem` 變數中的每一個 ，建立 `displayedWorkflows`。The code creates a `ListViewItem` for each found in a `displayedWorkflows` variable. 每個 都包含 、 和 屬性的字串表示。Each contains a string representation of the , the and properties. 而且之後會將項目加入至 `workflowStatusList`。It then adds the item to a `workflowStatusList`. 此程式碼會使用先前命名的屬性值與 屬性的字串版本，建立同時加入至 `WorkflowStatusInfo` 的新 `workflowStatusList` 物件。The code uses the previously named property values and a string version of the property to create a new `WorkflowStatusInfo` object that is also added to the `workflowStatusList`. 這個程式碼範例是 Mainform.cs 檔案中＜工作流程監視器 SDK＞範例的一部分。This code example is part of the Workflow Monitor SDK Sample from the Mainform.cs file. [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [工作流程監視](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2)。 [Workflow Monitor](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2). [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#137](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets1.cs#137)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#137](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets1.vb#137)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ActivityEvents As IList(Of ActivityTrackingRecord)

summary.span: 取得活動追蹤記錄清單，這些項目已由執行階段追蹤基礎結構為此工作流程執行個體傳送到 資料庫。

span.span: Gets the list of activity tracking records that have been sent for this workflow instance to a database by the run-time tracking infrastructure.

value.span: 物件的清單，這些物件已由執行階段追蹤基礎結構為此工作流程執行個體傳送至追蹤資料庫。

span.span: The list of objects sent for this workflow instance to the tracking database by the run-time tracking infrastructure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 是 `true`， 會包含目前為止為此工作流程執行個體送出的活動追蹤記錄。如果 是 `false`， 會包含最後一次 前送出的活動追蹤記錄。If is `true`, contains all activity tracking records sent for this workflow instance up to the current time; if is `false`, contains the activity tracking records sent up until the last . 包含由執行階段追蹤基礎結構為此工作流程執行個體傳送至資料庫的活動追蹤記錄。 contains activity tracking records sent to a database by the run-time tracking infrastructure for this workflow instance. 只有當工作流程執行個體發出的活動狀態事件對應至執行個體的 中指定的 時，工作流程執行階段引擎追蹤基礎結構才會傳送活動追蹤記錄。Activity tracking records are sent by the workflow run-time engine tracking infrastructure only when the workflow instance emits an activity status event that corresponds to an specified in the for the instance.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AutoRefresh { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指定存取此 的屬性資料時，是否要自動更新資料。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether property data for this should be automatically updated when it is accessed.

value.span: 如果要在存取屬性資料時自動重新整理資料，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if property data should be automatically refreshed when it is accessed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 為了使資料庫效能最佳化，維護查詢資料集合的屬性 (例如 ) 只會在屬性經過存取時才向資料庫查詢新項目，而且這類屬性的集合只會在屬性經過存取時視需要進行更新。To optimize database performance, properties that maintain collections of queried data, such as , query the database for new elements only when the property is accessed, and the collection for such a property is only updated on an as-required basis when the property is accessed. 類別會維護每個屬性的兩個時間戳記： 一種表示上次集合的追蹤資料的時間載入，和另一種表示上次上次重新整理。The class maintains two timestamps for each property: one that indicates the time that tracking data for the collection was last loaded, and another that indicates the last time the was refreshed. 當您取得其中一個集合屬性時， 會載入任何從上次載入集合的追蹤資料到上次重新整理 的這段時間內加入資料庫的追蹤資料，並且會將這筆資料加入至屬性所維護的集合中。When you get one of the collection properties, the loads any tracking data that was added to the database between the last time tracking data for the collection was loaded and the last time the was refreshed and adds this data to the collection maintained by the property. 接著，表示上次載入屬性資料的時間戳記會設定為表示上次重新整理的時間戳記值。The timestamp that indicates the last time data was loaded for the property is then set to the value of the timestamp that indicates the last refresh. 如果這兩個時間戳記相等，則當存取該屬性時，就不會載入屬性的其他追蹤資料。If these two timestamps are equal, additional tracking data is not loaded for the property when it is accessed. 為了在每次存取集合屬性時執行重新整理，並確保該屬性維護的集合中傳回的追蹤資料一律是目前的資料，請將 設定為 `true`。Set to `true` to perform a refresh every time a collection property is accessed and ensure that the tracking data returned in the collection maintained by that property is always current. 如果 是 `false`，您必須呼叫 ，重設對應至上次重新整理的時間戳記。If is `false`, you must call to reset the timestamp that corresponds to the last refresh.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property DateTime Initialized { DateTime get(); void set(DateTime value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 ，這個項目表示工作流程執行階段引擎要求此工作流程執行個體第一個 的時間。

span.span: Gets or sets a that indicates the time at which the first for this workflow instance was requested by the workflow run-time engine.

value.span: ，表示工作流程執行階段引擎要求此工作流程執行個體第一個 的時間。

span.span: A that indicates the time at which the first for this workflow instance was requested by the workflow run-time engine.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得所顯示之工作流程清單中所包含的全部 物件相關資訊。The following code example shows how to obtain information about all objects contained in a list of displayed workflows. 此程式碼會針對出現在 `ListViewItem` 變數中的每一個 ，建立 `displayedWorkflows`。The code creates a `ListViewItem` for each found in a `displayedWorkflows` variable. 每個 都包含 、 和 屬性的字串表示。Each contains a string representation of the , the and properties. 而且之後會將項目加入至 `workflowStatusList`。It then adds the item to a `workflowStatusList`. 此程式碼會使用先前命名的屬性值與 屬性的字串版本，建立同時加入至 `WorkflowStatusInfo` 的新 `workflowStatusList` 物件。The code uses the previously named property values and a string version of the property to create a new `WorkflowStatusInfo` object that is also added to the `workflowStatusList`. 這個程式碼範例是 Mainform.cs 檔案中＜工作流程監視器 SDK＞範例的一部分。This code example is part of the Workflow Monitor SDK Sample from the Mainform.cs file. [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [工作流程監視](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2)。 [Workflow Monitor](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2). [!code-csharp[Wf_samples#288](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets24.cs#288)] [!code-vb[Wf_samples#288](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets24.vb#288)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InvokedWorkflows As IList(Of SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance)

summary.span: 取得對應已由此工作流程叫用之工作流程的 物件清單。

span.span: Gets a list of objects that correspond to workflows that have been invoked by this workflow.

value.span: 對應已由此工作流程叫用之工作流程的 物件清單。

span.span: A list of objects that correspond to workflows that have been invoked by this workflow.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 為 `true`， 會包含目前為止此工作流程執行個體叫用的每個工作流程執行個體的 。如果 為 `false`， 會包含最後一次 前，此工作流程執行個體叫用的每個工作流程執行個體的 。If is `true`, contains a for each of the workflow instances that has been invoked by this workflow instance up to the current time; if is `false`, contains a for each of the workflow instances that has been invoked by this workflow instance up until the last . 包含在 所管理之 SQL 資料庫中的這個工作流程執行個體的追蹤資料，決定了這個屬性的內容。The contents of this property are determined by the tracking data for this workflow instance contained in the SQL database managed by the . 這個追蹤資料會對應到執行階段追蹤基礎結構所傳送的追蹤記錄，以便追蹤與這個工作流程執行個體關聯之 中的追蹤點所指定的事件。This tracking data corresponds to tracking records that are sent by the run-time tracking infrastructure for tracking events that are specified by the track points in the associated with this workflow instance.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Guid InvokingWorkflowInstanceId { Guid get(); void set(Guid value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定叫用此工作流程執行個體之工作流程執行個體的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the of the workflow instance that invoked this workflow instance.

value.span: 叫用此工作流程執行個體之工作流程執行個體的 ，如果此工作流程執行個體不是由另一個工作流程執行個體叫用，則是空的 。

span.span: The of the workflow instance that invoked this workflow instance or an empty if this workflow instance was not invoked by another workflow instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含在 所管理之 SQL 資料庫中的這個工作流程執行個體的追蹤資料，決定了這個屬性的內容。The contents of this property are determined by the tracking data for this workflow instance contained in the SQL database managed by the . 這個追蹤資料會對應到執行階段追蹤基礎結構所傳送的追蹤記錄，以便追蹤與這個工作流程執行個體關聯之 中的追蹤點所指定的事件。This tracking data corresponds to tracking records that are sent by the run-time tracking infrastructure for tracking events that are specified by the track points in the associated with this workflow instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不會實際載入 的任何資料。 does not actually load any data for the . 為了使資料庫效能最佳化， 類別會視需要載入其集合屬性的資料。To optimize database performance, the class loads data for its collection properties on an as-required basis. 類別會維護每個屬性的兩個時間戳記： 一種表示上次集合的追蹤資料的時間載入，和另一種表示上次上次重新整理。The class maintains two timestamps for each property: one that indicates the time that tracking data for the collection was last loaded, and another that indicates the last time the was refreshed. 當您取得其中一個集合屬性時， 會載入任何從上次載入集合的追蹤資料到上次重新整理 的這段時間內加入資料庫的追蹤資料，並且會將這筆資料加入至屬性所維護的集合中。When you get one of the collection properties, the loads any tracking data that was added to the database between the last time tracking data for the collection was loaded and the last time the was refreshed and adds this data to the collection maintained by the property. 接著，表示上次載入屬性資料的時間戳記會設定為表示上次重新整理的時間戳記值。The timestamp that indicates the last time data was loaded for the property is then set to the value of the timestamp that indicates the last refresh. 如果這兩個時間戳記相等，則當存取該屬性時，就不會載入屬性的其他追蹤資料。If these two timestamps are equal, additional tracking data is not loaded for the property when it is accessed. 會設定對應至上次重新整理 的時間戳記。 sets the timestamp that corresponds to the last refresh to .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Workflow::Runtime::WorkflowStatus Status { System::Workflow::Runtime::WorkflowStatus get(); void set(System::Workflow::Runtime::WorkflowStatus value); };

summary.span: 取得工作流程執行個體的狀態。

span.span: Gets the status of the workflow instance.

value.span: 表示工作流程執行個體目前狀態的 。

span.span: A that represents the current status of the workflow instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是根據工作流程執行個體的追蹤資料決定，尤其是由執行階段追蹤基礎結構傳送的工作流程追蹤記錄。因此， 也會部分取決於工作流程執行個體的 中的 物件。 is determined based on the tracking data for the workflow instance, specifically on the workflow tracking records sent by the run-time tracking infrastructure; therefore depends, in part, on the objects in the for the workflow instance. 每個 中的 都會對應至其中一個 值。 in each maps to one of the values. 如果執行階段追蹤基礎結構尚未為此工作流程執行個體傳送任何工作流程追蹤記錄，則 為 。If no workflow tracking records have been sent by the run-time tracking infrastructure for this workflow instance, is . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得所顯示之工作流程清單中所包含的全部 物件相關資訊。The following code example shows how to obtain information about all objects contained in a list of displayed workflows. 此程式碼會針對出現在 `ListViewItem` 變數中的每一個 ，建立 `displayedWorkflows`。The code creates a `ListViewItem` for each found in a `displayedWorkflows` variable. 每個 都包含 、 和 屬性的字串表示。Each contains a string representation of the , the and properties. 而且之後會將項目加入至 `workflowStatusList`。It then adds the item to a `workflowStatusList`. 此程式碼會使用先前命名的屬性值與 屬性的字串版本，建立同時加入至 `WorkflowStatusInfo` 的新 `workflowStatusList` 物件。The code uses the previously named property values and a string version of the property to create a new `WorkflowStatusInfo` object that is also added to the `workflowStatusList`. 這個程式碼範例是 Mainform.cs 檔案中＜工作流程監視器 SDK＞範例的一部分。This code example is part of the Workflow Monitor SDK Sample from the Mainform.cs file. [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [工作流程監視](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2)。 [Workflow Monitor](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2). remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 是 `true`， 會包含目前為止所有為此工作流程執行個體傳送的使用者追蹤記錄。如果 是 `false`， 會包含最後一次 前傳送的使用者追蹤記錄。If is `true`, contains all user tracking records sent for this workflow instance up to the current time; if is `false`, contains the user tracking records sent up until the last . 包含了由執行階段追蹤基礎結構為此工作流程執行個體傳送至資料庫的使用者追蹤記錄。 contains user tracking records sent to a database by the run-time tracking infrastructure for this workflow instance. 只有當工作流程執行個體發出的使用者事件對應至執行個體的 中指定的 時，工作流程執行階段引擎追蹤基礎結構才會傳送使用者追蹤記錄。User tracking records are sent by the workflow run-time engine tracking infrastructure only when the workflow instance emits a user event that corresponds to a specified in the for the instance.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得所顯示之工作流程清單中所包含的全部 物件相關資訊。The following code example shows how to obtain information about all objects contained in a list of displayed workflows. 此程式碼會針對出現在 `ListViewItem` 變數中的每一個 ，建立 `displayedWorkflows`。The code creates a `ListViewItem` for each found in a `displayedWorkflows` variable. 每個 都包含 、 和 屬性的字串表示。Each contains a string representation of the , the and properties. 而且之後會將項目加入至 `workflowStatusList`。It then adds the item to a `workflowStatusList`. 此程式碼會使用先前命名的屬性值與 屬性的字串版本，建立同時加入至 `WorkflowStatusInfo` 的新 `workflowStatusList` 物件。The code uses the previously named property values and a string version of the property to create a new `WorkflowStatusInfo` object that is also added to the `workflowStatusList`. 這個程式碼範例是 Mainform.cs 檔案中＜工作流程監視器 SDK＞範例的一部分。This code example is part of the Workflow Monitor SDK Sample from the Mainform.cs file. span.span: A number that can be used to find related records in separate views for this workflow instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是內部聯結作業。This is an internal join operation. 除了使用工作流程執行個體 以外， 提供了更有效率的方法來存取 SQL 資料庫中的工作流程執行個體資料。 provides a more efficient way to access data for a workflow instance in a SQL database than by using a workflow instance . 您可以使用 在不同的檢視中尋找此工作流程執行個體的相關記錄。Use to find related records for this workflow instance in separate views. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得所顯示之工作流程清單中所包含的全部 物件相關資訊。The following code example shows how to obtain information about all objects contained in a list of displayed workflows. 此程式碼會針對出現在 `ListViewItem` 變數中的每一個 ，建立 `displayedWorkflows`。The code creates a `ListViewItem` for each found in a `displayedWorkflows` variable. 每個 都包含 、 和 屬性的字串表示。Each contains a string representation of the , the and properties. 而且之後會將項目加入至 `workflowStatusList`。It then adds the item to a `workflowStatusList`. 此程式碼會使用先前命名的屬性值與 屬性的字串版本，建立同時加入至 `WorkflowStatusInfo` 的新 `workflowStatusList` 物件。The code uses the previously named property values and a string version of the property to create a new `WorkflowStatusInfo` object that is also added to the `workflowStatusList`. 這個程式碼範例是 Mainform.cs 檔案中＜工作流程監視器 SDK＞範例的一部分。This code example is part of the Workflow Monitor SDK Sample from the Mainform.cs file.
